name: NSTextTableBlock
desc: A text block that appears as a cell in a text table.

items.name: init(table: NSTextTable, startingRow: Int, rowSpan: Int, startingColumn: Int, columnSpan: Int)
items.desc: Returns an initialized text table block.

items.name: var table: NSTextTable
items.desc: Returns the table containing this text table block.

items.name: var startingRow: Int
items.desc: Returns the table row at which this text table block starts.

items.name: var rowSpan: Int
items.desc: Returns the number of table rows spanned by this text table block.

items.name: var startingColumn: Int
items.desc: Returns the table column at which this text table block starts.

items.name: var columnSpan: Int
items.desc: Returns the number of table columns spanned by this text table block.
